tool_description: Checks availability of specific wood species and quantities across local suppliers, lumberyards, and specialty dealers.

wood_species.description: Wood species to search for availability

location.description: City and state or zip code for search center

search_radius.description: Search radius in miles from location

lumber_grades.description: Acceptable lumber grades in order of preference

lead_time_max.description: Maximum acceptable lead time in days

error_messages: Invalid location: Location cannot be resolved to coordinates for supplier search
Invalid search radius: Must be between 5 and 200 miles
Invalid quantity: Required quantity must be positive and less than 50000 board feet
Invalid lead time: Maximum lead time must be between 1 and 365 days
No suppliers found: No suppliers carry this species within the specified radius and criteria
usage: Specify the wood species, quantity needed, location, and search radius. Optionally filter by grades, kiln-dried requirement, and lead time constraints.

available_suppliers.description: Names of suppliers with the species in stock

distances.description: Distance in miles to each supplier

stock_quantities.description: Available quantity in board feet at each supplier

lead_times.description: Lead time in days for each supplier

supplier_types.description: Type of supplier (retail, wholesale, specialty, mill)
